body.p: Some stakeholders said that maintaining financial stability in capital markets (the stability of a country’s or region’s economy or financial systems) should be an objective of financial reporting. They stated that financial reporting should focus on the needs of regulators and fiscal policy decision-makers who are responsible for maintaining financial stability.
